Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit
Summary: Extends provisions relating to establishing the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit and establishing the New York state council on the arts cultural program fund; relates to the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit.
LawCode: Amd Part PP subpart B ยง6, Chap 59 of 2021; amd ยง24-c, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend subpart B of part PP of chapter 59 of the laws of 2021 amending the tax law and the state finance law relating to establishing the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit and establishing the New York state council on the arts cultural program fund, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; to amend the tax law, in relation to the New York city musical and theatrical production tax credit
